y.io.graphml.output
Interface WriteEventHandler

public interface WriteEventHandler

The interface of the event trigger class that is used by the GraphMLWriteContext.getWriteEvents() property.

This interface defines the available events that client code can register to during a writing process.

See Also:
WriteEventListener, WriteEvent, GraphMLWriter, GraphMLWriteContext.getWriteEvents()

Method Summary

          Register a WriteEventListener.
